summary: Container class that encapsulates all tensor outputs produced by an ESM-based protein folding model, including geometric frames, side‑chain frames, backbone and side‑chain torsion angles, atomic coordinates, hidden states, per‑residue and pairwise embeddings, various logits (distogram, language model, PTM), amino‑acid indices, atom existence masks, residue‑to‑atom mapping tensors, and confidence metrics such as pLDDT, PTM scores, aligned confidence probabilities, and predicted alignment errors.
business_intent: Supply a comprehensive, structured representation of protein structure predictions and associated confidence measures for downstream bioinformatics pipelines, structural analysis, and validation workflows.
